tool.name: PczCollectivity
tool.description: : Extract PCA collectivity (numerical measure of how many atoms are affected by a given mode) from a compressed PCZ file.

param.help: Output json file with PCA Collectivity indexes per mode Format: [output].json

param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: eigenvector

param.label: binary_path
param.help: pczdump binary path to be used.
